Description
jdk.incubator.concurrent
Defines non-final APIs for concurrent programming.

  • Uses of ScopedValue.Carrier in jdk.incubator.concurrent

    Methods in jdk.incubator.concurrent that return ScopedValue.Carrier
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> ScopedValue.Carrier
    ScopedValue.Carrier.where(ScopedValue<T> key, T value)
    Returns a new Carrier with the mappings from this carrier plus a new mapping from key to value.
    static <T> ScopedValue.Carrier
    ScopedValue.where(ScopedValue<T> key, T value)
    Creates a new Carrier with a single mapping of a ScopedValue key to a value.
